body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMax customer support. My name is Ronald Powell and I will be assisting you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Rose Williams.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Rose. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking to return a car that I purchased recently.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I can assist you with that. Could you please provide me with the vehicle identification number (VIN) of the car you wish to return?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The VIN is one two three four, five six seven eight, nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Rose. Additionally, could you provide me with the date of purchase of the car in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The purchase date is the first of January, two zero two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Rose. I will now proceed to process your return request. Thank you for choosing CarMax.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Rose. Have a great day.
